title: Substitution
text: To determine the y-intercept, set $$x$$ equal to $$0$$ and solve for $$y$$.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: What should the value of $$y$$ be to set the equation "y=1/2(0)+3" true? Since the equation is formatted to isolate $$y$$ on one side, simply calculate the expression.
